short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the Displate art images larger so you can see what you're buying!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show the Displate art in high-res so you can see what you're buying! Easy view in carousel, or view individuals in a new tab. Click the on-page button or use the shortcuts:
Open Carousel: opt + c
Open FullScreen: opt + f

www.displate.com
